long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Enhance your texts with AI, in real time.

Discover how the Contents.ai Chrome extension can transform your online writing experience.

Perfect emails, blog articles, social media posts, and much more, directly from the web page you're visiting. With continuous AI assistance, every sentence is impactful and tailored to tell your story. Seamlessly integrate AI into your workflow and boost your productivity without ever leaving your browser. ğŸš€


What You Can Do with Contents.ai on Chrome:

ğŸ”¹ Always-On AI Chat: Get instant assistance to create, optimize, and rework content directly from the text on the web page you're visiting. The AI is always available to help with social posts, summaries, translations, and more. ğŸ’¬
ğŸ”¹ Full Integration with Gmail: Enhance your communication directly in Gmail. Write, translate, and improve emails with advanced tools for fast, professional results. ğŸ“§
ğŸ”¹ Web Content Extraction and Reworking: With the "Extract and Reorganize" feature, easily transform the content of any web page into new texts, without the tedious copy-paste process. ğŸ“„


How It Works:

ğŸ”¹ Install the Extension: Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension directly in your browser. ğŸ”§
ğŸ”¹ Activate the AI: After installation, click on the extension icon to open the AI chat on any web page. ğŸ–±ï¸
ğŸ”¹ Start Using It: Use the chat to improve your texts in real time, taking advantage of preset suggestions or creating custom content. âœï¸



Terms and Conditions of Service: This extension is available to customers with an active subscription. Discover how our AI can optimize your workflow and improve every word you write! ğŸŒ

Click on the â€œAdd to Chromeâ€ button on the extension page in the Chrome Web Store and follow the instructions to complete the installation.

ğŸ“Œ Is a subscription required to use the extension?

ğŸ“Œ Is the extension free?
The extension is free and integrates with your paid Contents.ai plan.

ğŸ“Œ Is the extension compatible with other productivity tools?
Yes, the extension integrates seamlessly with any web page, including Gmail, WordPress, LinkedIn, and other platforms, offering comprehensive support for writing and content optimization.

ğŸ“Œ How can I get support?
For any questions or issues, contact us at support@contents.ai, and our team will be happy to assist you.

Download now and transform your writing with Contents.ai! ğŸ“²
